articles.title: AirAsia X proposes paying 0.5% of US$8.1b debt - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (Oct 18): AirAsia X Bhd (AAX) is proposing to pay just 0.5% of debt owed to each of its creditors and to terminate all existing contracts so that it can restructure RM33.65 billion (US$8.1 billion) of liabilities, a document seen by Reuters shows…
